original_text:
if I sharpen my flashing sword
    and my hand takes hold on judgment,
I will take vengeance on my adversaries
    and will repay those who hate me.
korean_text: 내가 내 번쩍이는 칼을 갈며 내 손이 정의를 붙들고 내 대적들에게 복수하며 나를 미워하는 자들에게 보응할 것이라

sentences.original_text: if I sharpen my flashing sword
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 번쩍이는 나의 칼을 간다면

sentences.original_text: and my hand takes hold on judgment,
I will take vengeance on my adversaries
and will repay those who hate me.
